lead_paragraph: Baseball cap turned backward, pumping himself up with cries of "C'MON!" Lleyton Hewitt fought one last feisty encounter. Then he gathered his three young kids on center court and said farewell.
snippet: Baseball cap turned backward, pumping himself up with cries of "C'MON!" Lleyton Hewitt fought one last feisty encounter. Then he gathered his three young kids on center court and said farewell....

headline.main: Lleyton Hewitt Retires in Farewell at Australian Open
headline.print_headline: Lleyton Hewitt Retires in Farewell at Australian Open
